content: Investments Stocks Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 Apr 2019Twitter and Snapchat on the rise? Is it strange that its doing well but never caught on in Singapore?1 answerAnswerBump0

Brandan Chen, Financial Planner at Manulife SingaporeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 25 Apr 2019Singapore is honestly too small of a market for most technology firms to be concerned about. There are alot of apps/food/brands that caught on overseas and never in Singapore but are doing extremely well on the global stage as a whole.If we think from the company perspective that resources are limited, would the company channel more efforts in targeting our little island country or select a country with much higher population0 comments0
